mapper.insert: insert into hot (id, jid, jname, jcommpany_name, type_c, jcommpany_type, jarea, click_times, time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{jid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcommpanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcommpanyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select jid from (select jid,sum(click_times)from hot group by jid order by sum(click_times) DESC limit #{start},#{end}) t
select id, jid, jcommpany_type , time, sum(click_times) as sum from hot ##where DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d'), '2021-02-24') = 0 group by jcommpany_type order by sum desc limit 0,5
